Text: if you use winblows you can use nero to burn this, mount as an image, do a disc to disc copy ingoring the errors. give it some time and it will work. used 5 discs before i found a way to burn these that works.
this isn't a normal iso9660 CD image, instead it is SGIs efs filesystem, you have to dump it 1:1 on the CD since the installation disks (as other CDs from SGI) are supposed to be in efs.
